column4: How do I uninstall ubuntu? I have had problems with it freezing since I downloaded it, and now I can't even start it without it freezing as soon as I log in...
if you installed it via Wubi, get back into Windows and remove it from "Add/Remove Programs." If its a physical install, pop in your Windows CD or another OS and install over it.
If Windows is already on there, pop in the CD and go into recovery console, issue a "fixmbr" and it will essentially remove Ubuntu. Then from Windows you can regain the space.
